title: Drawing, Design for a Round Four-Legged Dining Table with Bun-Feet, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for a Round Four-Legged Dining Table with Bun-Feet
medium: Pen and black ink on thin, cream paper
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink,  lower left : Dining Table
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Round molded table top wth dividing stretcher across center; four fluted columnar legs elaborately carved at bottoms and terminating in carved square-shaped elements on bun feet; legs joined by stretchers decorated with carved acanthus leaf scrolls.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for a Round Four-Legged Dining Table with Bun-Feet, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin, cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-126.
